title: Making a Spectacle:  A Fashionable History of Glasses, an interview with Jessica Glasscock, part 1
itunes:title: Making a Spectacle:  A Fashionable History of Glasses, an interview with Jessica Glasscock, part 1
description:
Fashion historian Jessica Glasscock joins us for a two-part episode on the fascinating, 750 year history of eyeglasses and eyewear. Jessica is the author of the new book Making a Spectacle: A Fashionable History of Glasses.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
